Find it at dscnitrourkela/project-elaichi. An all in one app for students at NIT Rourkela. ðŸ’» Developing a vim plugin inspired by pubspec-assist extension for VS Code.

item.title: Vim for Flutter
item.description: Introduction I am Flutter developer and I love vim. Requirements Vim or Neovim. I personally use Neovim because I just happen to like it. Vim-plug Dart and Flutter installation Plugins Colorscheme Treesitter for better syntax highlighting Dart Vim Plugin Coc Flutter Vimspector Vim Test Snippets(LSP) Completion(LSP) Colorscheme Gruuuuuuvbox baby - Community version Treesitter Offers much better syntax highlighting Dart Vim Plugin Official dart plugin to integrate dart format, indentation, and a lot more
